summary: Add OpenTelemetry tracing support to the PHP SDK, built on top of interceptors. The functionality will be provided in a separate repository.
userImpact: Users can instrument their Temporal workflows with OpenTelemetry tracing for better observability and monitoring.
proposedFix: Implement OTEL tracing support using interceptors, following patterns from other SDKs.
resolutionDetails: Functionality provided in separate repository (sdk-php-interceptors-opentelemetry) after completion of PR #313.
keyQuote: The functionality will be provided in a separate repository (github.com/temporalio/sdk-php-interceptors-opentelemetry).
